days.title: Foundation & Setup
tasks: Set up affiliate tracking links with UTM parameters
Create dedicated landing page for e-commerce audience
Join relevant Facebook groups and online communities

days.title: Content Calendar Creation
tasks: Plan 30 days of e-commerce-focused content
Research trending topics in online retail
Schedule posts across Instagram, TikTok, and LinkedIn

days.title: First Outreach Wave
tasks: Send 20 personalized DMs to e-commerce store owners
Comment on 10 posts in target communities
Share value-driven content with tracking link

days.title: Community Engagement
tasks: Answer questions in e-commerce groups
Share success story or case study
Host Q&A in Stories or live session

days.title: Optimize & Test
tasks: Review tracking link performance
A/B test different messaging angles
Refine target audience based on engagement

days.title: Scale What Works
tasks: Double down on best-performing content
Increase outreach volume by 50%
Partner with complementary service providers

days.title: Review & Plan Next Phase
tasks: Analyze week 1 metrics and conversions
Document lessons learned
Set goals and strategy for week 2
